column2: Mission Statement\rGrimmer Elementary works to provide a bully-free environment where students can learn in a comfortable and safe place while still having\rfun. At Grimmer
column3: students are humble to one and other and treat others equally every single day.\r\rBill of Rights\rEach Student has the right to:\r•Everyone has the right to have their  own opinion/voice and be themselves\r•Everyone has the right to have an education\r•Each student at grimmer has a right to learn in a quiet environment\r•Students have the right to feel equal and not be judged\r\rCode of Conduct\rEach student is expected to...\r1.Treat people how you want to be treated\r2.Be responsible for your actions\r3.Come to school with the right mindset / come prepared to school\r4.Respect teachers
